block.p: Laura Margaret Moffatt and Edmond F. Thompson are to be married today at St. Patrick's Church in Huntington, N.Y. The Rev. John J. Denniston, a Roman Catholic priest, is to perform the ceremony.
The bride, 36, is the director of public relations at Mary McFadden Couture in New York. She graduated from Marymount College of Virginia.
Laura Margaret Moffatt and Edmond F. Thompson are to be married today at St. Patrick's Church in Huntington, N.Y. The Rev. John J. Denniston, a Roman Catholic priest, is to perform the ceremony.
The bride, 36, is the director of public relations at Mary McFadden Couture in New York. She graduated from Marymount College of Virginia.

She is a daughter of Katherine and Thomas J. Moffatt of Huntington. Her father owns Moffatt & Moffatt Insurance, a brokerage firm in Huntington. Her mother retired as the director of the Visiting Nurse Service of Suffolk County, a nonprofit organization in Northport, N.Y., that provides home health care.

Mr. Thompson, 34, is a vice president in New York in the national corporate banking group of Banc One Capital Markets, the investment banking subsidiary of Bank One. He graduated from New York University and received an M.B.A. from Pace University.

The bridegroom is the son of Hermine and Edmond J. Thompson of North Merrick, N.Y. His father, now retired, taught science at McKenna Junior High School in Massapequa, N.Y., and was a lieutenant colonel in the Army Reserve.
